EmailTemplate.subject: Protect Your Aircraft and Control Maintenance Costs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Do you know the cost of repairing your avionics equipment? Better yet, are you prepared to cover the costs that keep your aircraft ready at a moments notice?
Take the uncertainty out of repair and maintenance costs and guarantee your repair bills won’t exceed your budget with the Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics. Designed for both fixed and rotary wing aircraft, the Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics is a fixed-price extended full coverage warranty program for Honeywell avionics.
The new Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics program includes all the same great features of our legacy HAPP program, with a few added benefits including:
- Options to upgrade your coverage with cosigned inventory management for faster turnaround times and obsolescence coverage - Optional coverage for all the avionics on your aircraft, including products from other OEMs - Annual subscription and full content coverage - Early enrollment in Lieu of Warranty
To learn more about how to protect your investment and getting a quote, contact us by clicking on the link below.
